remediation: Upgrade bacnet-stack/bacnet-stack to version 1.3.2 or higher.
title: Out-of-bounds Read

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Out-of-bounds Read via the bacapp_decode_application_data function in bacapp.c . An attacker can cause a buffer over-read, potentially leading to information disclosure or denial of service by sending crafted packets to be processed by this function.
